Characters.Character: DAVE AND SABRINA TALKING AND LAUGHING

Replies.Reply: as they meander through the courses of their meal. We've never seen Dave so animated and alive and happy...
Thank you all for coming. My name is Erin Walsh and I will be mediating your claim today...
Kinkabe agrees in principle to the terms of the sale, and valuates your company at 725 million dollars. This is their last and final offer. I'll be outside.
Sir, Mr. Kinkabe has agreed to the 825 million. The deal is closed.
Mr. Norton?! Sir?!
RAIN blankets Los Angeles that night. It's an epic storm...
WHAM! She throws him against the bathroom wall and starts aggressively undressing him.
And then he stops short. On Sabrina's lower back is a cute tramp stamp tattoo of a BUTTERFLY.
Just then CARA runs up and hugs her Dad.
I gotta go feed her baby, but congrats on your new gig, bro.
